document_summary.title: Daily_Closing_Brief_(23.12.13)_20231214_유안타증권.pdf
document_summary.content:
The provided text is about the daily closing brief of the equity market. It provides information on the performance of the KOSPI and KOSDAQ indices, as well as other Asian markets. It also mentions the performance of specific sectors and companies within the Korean market. 

Some of the questions that this text can answer include:
- What was the performance of the KOSPI and KOSDAQ indices?
- How did other Asian markets perform?
- Which sectors and companies showed positive or negative performance?
- What factors influenced the market's performance?
- What is the outlook for the market?
